text: Mephisto is a 1981 Hungarian German Austrian drama movie directed by István Szabó and was based on the novel of the same name by Klaus Mann. It stars Klaus Maria Brandauer, Krystyna Janda, Ildikó Bánsági, Rolf Hoppe, György Cserhalmi, Péter Andorai, Karin Boyd, Christine Harbort and won an Academy Award in 1982. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 drama movies Category:1980s epic movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:German drama movies Category:Austrian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by István Szabó Category:Movies about actors Category:Movies set in the 1930s
title: Mephisto (1981 movie)
